title: Ep - 148 - DIRECTOR OF ABDUCTED IN PLAIN SIGHT / EVAN SMITH FROM TEMPTATION ISLAND
description:
Abducted in Plain Sight Director Skye Borgman and Producers Emily Kincaid and Stephanie Tobey discuss how they developed their Netflix documentary about 12-year old Jan Broberg who was abducted from her small Idaho town in 1974 by a sociopathic neighbor and close family friend. This stranger than fiction true story of the Brobergs, a naïve church going family is the winner of 14 awards and quickly becoming the most talked about documentary of 2019. 


Digital Content Creator and Social Media Consultant Cassydy Berliner reviews this week’s episode of Vanderpump Rules.


Ashley Sullivan reviews Yummy Mummies on Netflix, an Australian reality show that follows wealthy expectant moms trying to outdo one another. 


Evan Smith from Temptation Island talks about how his own family tragedy made him consider joining the show with his girlfriend and how the experience helped their relationship.


Reality Life with Kate Casey
